Package oh_hecc

Interface Parseable

All Known Subinterfaces:
MetadataEditingInterface, MetadataReadingInterface, PassageEditingInterface, PassageReadingInterface, SharedMetadata, SharedPassage
All Known Implementing Classes:
EditableMetadata, EditablePassage
public interface Parseable
Currently only holds some constants with passage name regexes, and a static method to validate a passage name via regex

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.lang.String PASSAGE_NAME_REGEX
    A regex pattern for the passage names.
    static java.lang.String PASSAGE_NAME_REGEX_WITH_WHITESPACE
    Ditto, but allows leading/trailing whitespace
    static java.lang.String STANDALONE_PASSAGE_NAME_REGEX_WITH_WHITESPACE
    regex for checking if a string that's just supposed to contain a passage name is valid or not (expects end of line)

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.lang.String validatePassageNameRegex​(java.lang.String passageNameToCheck)
    A method to ensure a given passage name satisfies the passage name regex rules

  • Field Details

    • PASSAGE_NAME_REGEX

      static final java.lang.String PASSAGE_NAME_REGEX
      A regex pattern for the passage names. Starts and ends with any word character (alphanumeric+underscores), may have spaces and/or - between first and last character (min length of 1)
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • PASSAGE_NAME_REGEX_WITH_WHITESPACE

      static final java.lang.String PASSAGE_NAME_REGEX_WITH_WHITESPACE
      Ditto, but allows leading/trailing whitespace
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • STANDALONE_PASSAGE_NAME_REGEX_WITH_WHITESPACE

      static final java.lang.String STANDALONE_PASSAGE_NAME_REGEX_WITH_WHITESPACE
      regex for checking if a string that's just supposed to contain a passage name is valid or not (expects end of line)
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • validatePassageNameRegex

      static java.lang.String validatePassageNameRegex​(java.lang.String passageNameToCheck) throws InvalidPassageNameException
      A method to ensure a given passage name satisfies the passage name regex rules
      Parameters:
      passageNameToCheck - the passage name to check
      Returns:
      a trimmed version of the valid passage name (if it's valid)
      Throws:
      InvalidPassageNameException - if the passage name was invalid
